about_the_game:
Can you make my heart sing?

Description

Bardic: Quest for Love is a top-down Adventure/Dating. A simple bard, you have been tasked to resurrect a rundown tavern in the city of Deepharbor. To achieve this, you'll need the help of trusty employees.

Genre

Adventure / Dating Sim

Target Audience

Fans of D&D/Medieval Fantasy and Quirky RPGs/Dating Sims

Target Platform

PC

Gameplay

You begin as Edmond or Edna. You're a bard who suddenly became the owner of a struggling Tavern. While understanding the ins and outs of managing an establishment, your talents as a bard land you an invitation to perform at the Spring Hearts Ball. The catch: You'll need a partner to perform with you.

You are given four weeks to make life-changing decisions, find your duet partner, seek adventures, and keep your tavern alive.

How will you fare in fair Deepharbor?



You will be introduced to 12 colorful heroes. You can interact with them and involve yourself in quirky dialogue and intriguing stories. You may also recruit these heroes to work for you at your Tavern.

The game is still in its early stages of development with more features to be announced soon!

Enjoy a cozy game while immersing in unique tales of adventure, romance, and intrigue.

Support us on Kickstarter! -

content_descriptors.notes: This work of fiction contains themes of fantasy violence, mature humor, strong language, and mild suggestive themes.
